alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:10PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 0 degrees. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures can cause frostbite on exposed skin in a short period of time. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx. &&
